card1: You must log in with your CMPC account
card2: You can have a profile picture, full name and branch where you work
card3: As the trivia is overcome, you will add points that you can use to win different prizes
card4: You will be able to use a character that will be unlocked for higher level users
card5: Increase the level in the Ranking, for which there will be special surprises for those who remain in the TOP 10
card6: If you fail and do not pass, you can try again. However, it will be punished with a lower score
